name: 2D Shooter Update
description:
Modifications:

  1. Created the art for and a script for a pickup that changes the firing mode of the shooter.
  2. Created a whole new level where the player has to survive.
  3. Created a script for the new level, which changes the win condition to having to survive for a certain amount of time.
  4. Also added a background to the main menu, but that wasn't a big change.
